thread.section_title: The Westin New York at Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location & Good Service
thread.title_full: Great Location & Good Service - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Steven F
title: Great Location & Good Service
text: The hotel was very good, the rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable. We traveled to NYC with our teen-aged grandchildren. The hotel gave us rooms next to each other which was great. The room service staff was friendly and the rooms were cleaned up very quickly. The only negative would be that the in house restaurant was basically bar food. They could upgrade it a bit, however there were many good restaurants nearby.
